meanings.definition: The presence of a virus in the bloodstream.
meanings.sent1: Viremia can occur when a virus enters the blood.
meanings.sent2: Doctors can detect viremia through blood tests.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky virus caused viremia, turning the blood into a viral party!
meanings.sent4: The viremia spread through the bloodstream like wildfire, infecting every corner.
meanings.sent5: The concept of viremia is like having uninvited guests in your bloodstream.

meanings.definition: The condition of having a high level of virus in the blood.
meanings.sent1: Severe viremia can lead to serious health issues.
meanings.sent2: The patient's viremia levels were dangerously high.
meanings.sent3: The viremia in his blood made him feel like a walking virus factory!
meanings.sent4: Her viremia was like a storm brewing in her veins, ready to unleash chaos.
meanings.sent5: The vivid image of viremia flooding his blood made him shudder.
